Package net.java.jddac.common.util

Provides miscellaneous utility and helper objects used by various APIs within JDDAC.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConfigurationInterface All objects which are to be configured via the configuration mechanism need to implement this interface.
LogHandler Interface for Log class to send log messages to Handler.
Status.Report Helper interface for Status.
 

Class Summary
ArgStore Stores objects of type Vector and ArgArray into persistent storage.
ArgStoreFileJ2me Stores an ArgumentArray into persistent store.
ArgStoreJ2me Stores an ArgumentArray into persistent store.
ArgStoreJ2se Stores or retrieves an ArgumentArray into/from a persistent store for a J2SE environment.
ArgXmlConverter Encodes and decodes ArgArray and Vector objects into/from XML.
ConditionEval Evalutates user specified conditions and generates a result.
CRC32 Calculate CRC32.
GenericArgArrayStore This class extends GenericStore with the addition of a property field for each record in the store.
GenericStore Provides methods to access a pair of database tables.
Hex Provides String/hex to/from conversions.
Log JDDAC logging facility.
LogFileHandlerBlock Log handler for printing to a rotating set of files.
LogInit Initialize the Log class with default levels.
LogStdoutHandlerBlock Log handler for printing to stdout.
ObjectRegistry Deprecated.  
PortFactory This is the Factory class for creating Ports.
StartupInit Provides a several static methods to assist with object creation.
Status A class to accumulates status messages into a form that is queryable for use in GUIs and J2ME debugging.
StringToker A class to perform basic string token parsing.
SubscriberRegistry Keeps track of publication topics and the Subscribers which are subscribing to those topics.
XYDataset2 Random data for a scatter plot demo.
 

Package net.java.jddac.common.util Description

Provides miscellaneous utility and helper objects used by various APIs within JDDAC.
